name: Arches National Park
description: A stunning collection of natural stone arches and desert landscapes.

name: Canyonlands National Park
description: A massive park of canyons, mesas, and rivers carved by the Colorado River.

name: Dead Horse Point State Park
description: Famous for dramatic overlooks of the Colorado River and Canyonlands.

name: Slickrock Bike Trail
description: World-renowned trail for mountain biking with epic scenery.

name: Moab Giants Dinosaur Park
description: Life-size dinosaur replicas and a 3D theater experience.

name: La Sal Mountains
description: Snow-capped peaks with hiking, lakes, and scenic drives.

name: Hole N" The Rock
description: Quirky 5,000 sq ft home carved into sandstone.

name: Moab Museum
description: Exhibits on regional history, geology, and Indigenous cultures.
